derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: contracted form of of kin

entry.def: If one thing is akin to another, it is similar to it in some way.

example.ex: Listening to his life story is akin to reading a good adventure novel.
example.tran: 听他的人生故事犹如阅读一本精彩的冒险小说。

means.word_mean: 1. similar or related in quality or character;

sentences.sentence: "the amateur is closely related to the collector"
